msbt.message: Almost Fishing Tourney time! I can't wait, !
I'm going all out for today's Fishing Tourney! Just watch This time I'll make a splash!
The Fishing Tourney starts this morning at nine! There are some great prizes to win this time too.
I'm not the best at fishing, but the vibe around here during a tourney still gets me excited every time.
The Fishing Tourney is underway! There's a prize I have my eyes on, but I hope everyone just has fun!
Great day for the Fishing Tourney, isn't it? If you're competing today, good luck reeling in the big ones!
It's going to be hard waiting for the next Fishing Tourney, .
It makes me a little sad that today's Fishing Tourney is over.
Today was fun, ! I'm glad I fished in the tourney, even if I didn't catch very much.
How's it going? I haven't actually started fishing yet in the tourney. I guess I'm still working up to it.
I should have really made time for a little more fishing practice. I did read up on fishing, though
I'm going to watch everyone else fishing in the tourney today and try to learn from observing them.
Everyone's raring to fish today! , let's wish each other good luck, OK?
I've really been off my game during this Fishing Tourney.Maybe I've been putting too much pressure on myself to win, but that's only because I HAVE TO WIN! Uh, anyway

If this isn't perfect fishing weather, then I don't know what is.Oh, by the way, I'm compiling a list of the most scenic places on the island to fish, . If you have any good spots for me to add, be sure and let me know!
Are you participating in the Fishing Tourney too? A little playful competition always "reels" me in. I wonder what types of fish we can catch this time of year Time to consult the Critterpedia!
Spending time in the great outdoors might be my favorite part of being in this Fishing Tourney. Of course, having a chance to hang out with you is my second-favorite part, .
I don't care how cold it is outside. Nothing could stop me from participating in this tourney. The chill in the air just makes those moments spent waiting for a fish all the more exhilarating!
Springtime Fishing Tourneys are my favorite, !I've got a really good feeling about today. I can smell the fish already!
It sure is a hot one today, isn't it? Not exactly perfect weather for a Fishing Tourney, but we'll make do. Hopefully the fish don't mind the heat, !
How are you enjoying the Fishing Tourney today, ?I read somewhere that fall is the best season for fishing. I believe it!Then again, I've always thought of fall as the best season, period.
It sure is a hot one today, isn't it? Not exactly perfect weather for a Fishing Tourney, but we'll make do. Hopefully the fish don't mind the heat, !
How are you enjoying the Fishing Tourney today, ?I read somewhere that fall is the best season for fishing. I believe it!Then again, I've always thought of fall as the best season, period.
I don't care how cold it is outside. Nothing could stop me from participating in this tourney. The chill in the air just makes those moments spent waiting for a fish all the more exhilarating!
Springtime Fishing Tourneys are my favorite, !I've got a really good feeling about today. I can smell the fish already!
